name: Pikupals: Picross + Aliens
description:
~Made for GBJAM 8~

Help Bea investigate mysterious ruins and help her new alien friends by solving picross puzzles! Featuring over 12 recruitable aliens, each with their own helpful ability.

CONTROLS:Control pad: WASD or arrow keysA: Z or MB: X or NStart: Enter or space bar

TIPS & TRICKS:

  • Never played picross before? Confused by the rules? Stuck on a puzzle? Read up on the game here!
  • Once you've recruited a few aliens past the first three, you can customize your team by presing the space bar on the map screen!
  • There is currently no direct way to exit out of a puzzle you didn't mean to start, though you can fail it on purpose with no penalty.
  • Abilities that reveal lines and columns "stack", which means using three characters who reveal one random line will always reveal three random lines, and so on.
  • According to my uncle who works at GBJam, look under the truck to find a super powerful secret monster!!!

Code and concept by Fredison
Art and character designs by Pyromantic
Music by Dmytro Nebesh
